explains: n. 顾问；高级顾问医师，会诊医师；咨询者
wordGroup: marketing consultant 营销顾问；市场顾问；销售顾问
consultant firm 咨询公司；顾问公司
consultant management 顾问工程管理

sentences.en: She is a consultant to the government.
He is currently engaged as a consultant.
He was a consultant rheumatologist at the local hospital.
sentences.cn: 他是当地医院的一位风湿病学顾问。
